segments.text: The kids look so excited sneaking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching to get them from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little stool is wobbling, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret adventure in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the mom is busy with dishes, not noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, that's a surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down like a waterfall inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will get soaked if she doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a sunny garden, so inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of little surprises and joys.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent their mischief is.
segments.speaker: PAR
